review: I enjoyed this visit to this location. The wait staff was prompt and the kitchen was quick as well. My food was delicious. This is a new location so the kinks are still getting worked  out. Great experience overall. The lunch service is good. Although you may not get the same menu specials this location is still good to visit. They have improved since opening.

I have gone two Sundays in a row to see what the service was like. On the first visit, I took a seat next to the bar and ordered beer. First order was from the bar, second was from a server. There seemed to be confusion as to which tables had ordered what because I was brought a drink order and a food order that I hadn't ordered. A table next to me complained that their food was cold.   On the second visit, I ordered two beers and a food order, fried shrimp and spinach. Service appears to have improved, as I didn't have other people's orders brought to me. But service was kind of slow given how simple my food order was. Bar isn't pushing drinks, as my pint glass sat empty without any of the bar tenders asking if I wanted another. Also noticed that shift change was slow. The management has no clue on how to run a high overhead operation.

I like TGI, I used to go there a lot when I lived in the county, overtime things change smh. However, once in a while I just want a throwback so this one is newly opened much closer.. Nice tv at the bars, friendly and efficient service.. It's a TGI so won't go much into the food as one knows what to expect. Nice place tho, will be a great place to catch a game and get your food in.
I will never come back here !!!!! Until they find some better cooks I know Friday's to have better tastings food,than that shit ! (Pardon my French)

I work for a fine dinning restaurant in down town Baltimore and I just happen to stop by Mondawwin,s new Friday's . Man what an experience  the  hostess was very pleasant, our server Ashley was on time with everything. Great job you guys. Places like this will bring our communities back.

Ok...so you know I was a bit nervous coming to this location.  I just knew it was gling to be "ghetto" because of where it is....but hey, I got over it!  I was pleasantly surprised when I walked in this newly opened location.  I am a self proclaimed Friday's expert lol so I was eager to see what the deal is. Can I say I absolutely love the open layout...especially being able to see the kitchen.  I appreciate the openness and being able to see the whole place from front to back.  The hostess Amoya who greeted us was awesome and I appreciated bbeing asked how my day was!  Every time I turned around all I saw was smiles from the staff and people busy making sure everything was in place.  Our server was "Na Na" and she was awesome!  Since this location is closer to my home than the normal Friday's I visit I hope the staff continue creating great experiences like tonight.

Going in it it was VERY skeptical, I fully intended on it not being the best. Boy was I wrong! I will start with the negatives, the service is a little slow, but we were seated in a timely fashion it just took a while for the waitress to come to the table. Also, the food took longer than expected but the quality completely made up for it! The waitress was very polite, did have to remind her of little things, but it was great! Honestly, the best food I've had at a Friday's by far; from appetizer to main course. The drink was a little watered down I got the Red Bull shush. Long story short I will go back they are stuck with me now and please tip the waitress.
I really hope they get it together in there. Long wait times on everything. Location has plenty of potential but lack of training is a huge issue.

I would give this Friday's a ZERO star rating if it were an option. I tried not to approach this dining experience with any prejudgment from other's reported ill encounters here. Unfortunately, I too walked away with a bad taste (pun intended) in my mouth.  Our party of four was seated in a small, tight booth right at the front door. When I asked our hostess for a more accommodating seating arrangement, she suggested there were no other seats available. TUH! We clearly saw plenty of other tables available. Perhaps she misunderstood my intentions. Shrugged this off.  We ordered 3 drinks... much to our disgust we received 1 drink that appeared to have a very tightly coiled (pubic-like) hair floating on top. *Barf* Our food came out cold, lethargic and well on its way to hospice care, displaying no signs of life. The nail in this old rusty coffin came by way of witnessing staff members fight in a wild, wild west saloon-style brawl in the exposed kitchen area. I guess the restaurant assigned police officer was unable to break up the melee in time. We scurried out in fear of our safety as I had my 8 year old son with me. Too, too much stimulus for a humble Wednesday evening. Fin
Kitchen was too slow! Not good at all! Drinks were horrible! Server was nice and tried to be attentive.   Food was ok! They have to do better! Trying to support community business.

Dropped the ball on this one, screwed my order up completely. I ordered Jack chicken and shrimp with mash and broccoli, I got a whole order of jack ribs, with no shrimp, mashed potatoes and French fries! Wtf double starch?? The other two entrees were only ok everything was cold. Plus my bill was $55 that wasn't what I budgeted. The person who took my order on the phone was pleasant but not knowledgable, he didn't know prices for the entrees and couldn't give me a total. Fortunately I knew what everything cost and it shouldn't have been $55! Trying to support local businesses but Mondawmin TGIFridays get it together.
The service has improved greatly compared to when it first opened. It's now a nice place to come & the chicken/shrimp pasta is a must try

So where do I start from , as We enter the restaurant we was told that it was a 15 min wait but as I looked in the restaurant it was several empty clean tabes. I asked the host why did we have to wait, she replied because the kitchen was backed up. That's absolutely ridiculous.  As we were seated we waited 25 mins for our drink as being order & 45 mins for our food. Which the food was sitting under the window for about 15 mins .  It's just too much to type but horrible experience

This place is gonna fall apart quick!!! Sat in the diner area took 45 mins to get even WATER!!!!! They no longer do the endless apps, and that is okay. We order drinks and didnt receive them until 20mins after the food came out hot which is kool. The manager came out and talked with us. Thats about it. Worse experience at a Fridays ive been to in the baltimore area. Get your game up

I called in an order for carry out here. The first time I called they hung up on me, the second time they took my order then hung up on me without any indication of how long it would take. When we got there we checked in with the hostess by the door. Then the other hostess asked us if we had checked in with anyone. We said yes, then she clarified and asked if we had informed anyone dressed like her. Like we didn't know what an employee was... After this initial unpleasantness things began to go more smoothly. The employee working the carry out area was much more pleasant and was quick in getting our food out (though he definitely forgot my name at one point). As for the food itself, well... it's TGI Friday's, we know what we're getting into. Overall ok, some issues with some of the staff, but we got what we came for.

Where do I start? Let me say that I am for empowerment and career development within the inner city. But, adding this location to the Friday's chain is a big mistake.  We waited for an extensive period for our soft drinks and appetizers. As we sat there, I watched the kitchen staff as they were preparing food. They all wore latex gloves that were a greasy, dirty,  unsanitized filthy mess. I watched them touch every surface within the kitchen, scratch their heads, noses, touch their clothing and then touch people's food. I was disgusted by this. The manager was also in the kitchen doing the same thing. I brought this to the attention of our server and expressed how this was very unsanitized and one of the reasons why people get sick. She then shared my concerns with the kitchen staff, who disregarded my concerns and continued as they were. Approximately 15 minutes later, the server brought out our food. I refused  my entree and the server as well as my family looked at me like I was crazy. However, I refuse to eat in such an establishment. Needless to say, I will not be returning to TGIF and will be sending a letter to headquarters.

I was very surprised  to see Fridays Restaurant  at Mondawmin  Mall. I thought it would  be great for the inner city community.  I must say I did have some concerns. I read alot of negativity about the service there so I decided to go along with my God mother  to see for myself. When we got there we were greeted by to young ladies. We  were seated. The atmosphere was nice.  We had a very pleasant waitress.  We were given our menus however we were never given or ask would we like water.  We ordered our food but surprisingly didn't have to wait too long. ( border line) The food was very good however I ordered a carry out, Baby back Ribs, Jasmine rice and spinach. When I got home I had no spinach, no rice and got french fries instead and paid full price for the meal. I called the restaurant  several  times but couldn't get thru. To sum it up my experience  was pretty good.

This is the most unprofessional Fridays EVER!!!!!! They don't even know how to make the food on their menu. Everyone has an attitude. The bartenders are the best thing here. Smh! I keep giving them a pass but gosh. They brought me pasta with a hand full of noodles and 3 pieces of chicken and 3 shrimp. Like did the cook what the rest of it?
Food ok, great bar deals, could improve on service. Bartenders are not attentive and cannot multitask.

This place is pretty bad. I wasn't expecting much and not much is what I got.  The place was far from crowded,  so I can't understand why I had to wait for a server to come to my table. Once she came she was actually very pleasant. Oh,  and the young man who seated me--I'm going to give him the benefit of the doubt and assume he is new or was at the end of ba tough shift! I went to wash my hands in a poorly kept men's room. I'll just say that I had to use hand sanitizer after that experience.  Paper towels clogging the urinal, unflushed toilet in the stall...nit good at all! I ordered fried shrimp with mac n cheese...unimpressive, but it's TGI Friday at Mondawmin! I really wanted to be impressed! How do you overcook the penne pasta in your own version of mac n cheese??? And WHY in the world is the floor so slippery? They're was a puddle of spilled something at my booth. I mentioned it to the server who seemed not to be overly concerned... This has confirmed my dislike for chain restaurants named for days of the week.

On April 8 2016 I came to this Fridays  to help celebrate  my sister Birthday and When I enter my stomach got upset due to how nasty I was greeted by the host who said it will be a 5 minute wait...... so me and my party ended up waiting over 30mins  I go back to the host like what happen to the 5 min wait.... he turn his head and say your seat is coming......after another 10 minutes we were lead to our sister and wasn't greeted for another 15 fifteen minutes and can't Remember the sever name but whoa she was in a bad mood  and was rushing me and my party to order.... drinks never came till our food came which was nasty..... Don't not go there and what a Shame  to the Fridays name!!!!!!!!!
If you're looking to actually sit down, have proper service, receive an accurate food/drink order in a timely manner, and get the check within 30 minutes of asking....then don't go here.

You only get two stars because the service was terrible. I had to ask for a waitress because we were sitting for at least 10 minutes and there were only four tables and about five people at the bar. The silverware was spotty. My friend ordered an appetizer and asked for it to come out with the entrees. He brought out with the appetizer. My appetizer came with sour cream with green onions in it. I got what he called ranch sour cream. What is that? I lost a bacon crumble in that mess. My other friend ordered a smaller portion salad, but was charged for a full salad and was brought a full salad. I kept looking at the plate like I should have gotten one two. Our food was really good. In total we got the Jack Daniel Sampler and matching burger, small portion loaded skins, mozzarella sticks, and some salad with chicken and strawberries. I've been calling the waiter him the entire time because he never asked us how we were doing, he wasn't sociable, he didn't introduce himself, he only checked on us after we'd already called him to the table, we found on the receipt that "he" is Justin.
This place has horrible service, seems very unorganized. Food is what's expected of TGIF , so no problems there

Pros:The food wasn't bad my buffalo wings were nice and wet, and came out hot I ordered two drinks sat at the bar it was cool I was there around 7pm. Not even crowded. I was apprehensive to come here after that cold slice of cheese pic but I ordered my salmon to go and it looks appealing. Anyways give them a chance...   Cons: they really do neglect you... Even at the bar... I had to wait for utensils after my food arrived which are usually placed there once seated...it was kinda uncomfortably cold due to AC...I wanted to tip more but It didn't make sense to me looking for service seated at the bar... I mean...Do y'all want the money? Anyways what is really nice is the open kitchen concept I think it's really bad ass and leaves little room for error for the anal clientele... Anyways if you going by these pics your missing out on your fav Friday's like I was

I had my doubts about going to this location but let me tell you i was sssoooooo wrong. The atmosphere is very nice. We went there for the cheesecake and ended up getting appetizers first. The appetizers were pretty good BUT the waitress Jazmine was awesome. Oh my goodness when she walked by she would acknowledge us and she just made our time there wonderful. She told us about the things that the restaurant will be starting soon such as karaoke and live music. I can guarantee you that Jazmine will be the reason i come back. I don't care how long i have to wait if she is in the building i will be seated in here section. And guess what...she wasn't even our waiter.

TERRIBLE TERRIBLE TERRIBLE! I went twice, I tried to give it another chance but it was the same result. The bartender was awful I had to speak to her for her to notice I was there. One order of boneless wings took 40 minutes. Once I received the check she charged my card for the wrong amount. DARNELL WAS A GREAT HELP! I feel so bad for him because he was making drinks, cooking, serving, and ringing out checks. SAD! If I could give -1 star I would.

Horrible, Horrible, Horrible service and lack of attention by management. I visited this location 8/25/16 at approx. 8:15pm. Party including myself was two people. We were immediately sat, at which time we sat for 10 minutes without being greeted and numerous wait staff and managers walking right past our table. After flagging down a waitress to ask who was our waiter, it took another five minutes for the waitstaff to figure out who was supposed to wait on our table, and for the waitress to come to the table. When she came to the table, she gave us a long drawn out story of how she was double sat, etc.. for a good two minutes. We ordered our appetizers, drink, and dinner in one go. When the appetizers came to the table, we had no silverware an was offered no appetizer plates. Since we ordered two appetizers, we had to push each appetizer across the table for sharing. Now lets move onto the food which was a nightmare. I ordered a salad and my mate ordered the chicken pasta. It took over 20 minutes for the waitress to come to the table with the wrong order. She brought the pasta and a burger that no one ordered. She took the burger back and said that the kitchen would make the salad. (Note:The pasta was dry) I waited over 20 minutes and still had no food. I had to request to speak to a manager who was clueless! He actually went behind the counter in the kitchen and attempted to make my salad to go at my request because it was getting late. The manager who made the salad never even came to the table to bring the salad, instead he had some random waiter drop off a pitiful salad on the table saying this was from the manager. our waitress never came back to the table after I called the manager over. I took a picture of the salad which was beyond a joke. It wasn't even what I ordered and the ingredients weren't consistent with the description on the menu. I took a picture of the salad in disbelief. I called yet another manager over to the table and asked him if he thought the salad in front of me was acceptable and if he would eat it. He hesitated and replied no, he wouldn't eat it. I asked why he thought it was acceptable to bring this salad out to a customer who has now waited over 30 minutes to eat and the restaurant wasn't busy ( ten tables or less seated in the dining room tops). I had to tell him that I didn't want the salad, or think that we should pay for the lousy service or food that they brought out. He told me that he was there to fix the multiple issues experienced at this location, then zero'd out our bill and we left. If there was a ZERO RATING they would get the GOLD.

Here again for lunch at the bar. One person working to serve 15 ppl and make the restaurants drinks.  Had to wait a little .. I'm only here because I was in the area and didnt want chicken or Chinese food in this area..

Went here with my boyfriend. I'm so disgusted that I don't feel like going into details. If you like inexperienced servers, piss poor service, cold food, disgustingly long wait times, and managers that don't have a clue, you'll love it here.

So I've never felt compelled to give only one star until today. I feel bad for the bartenders who were over worked. They don't seem to have experienced servers so the host was directing everyone to the bar (not the high tops because no one was covering them). The bartenders tried their best. The food was terrible, which is kind of impressive for a chain restaurant. My friend and I got traditional wings and mozzarella sticks. The first plate of mozzarella sticks had no cheese in them, and our first plate of wings was missing a traditional wing and had one "wing" that was the size of a quarter. We spoke to the manger and he redid our order, but the wings were cold and it was clear they reused some of the food (the marinara sauce had breading it before we ate anything from the redo order). I'm praying we don't get food poisoning. To top it off we waited over an hour for our food, our mojitos were way too sweet, and the bar area was extremely messy and dirty. Perhaps it's because we came in on 8:30 on a Thursday, but usually large chains are fairly reliable so it was surprising that this TGIF was so awful. My friend is so upset she going to contact the company. All I can say is until this location works out the kinks don't waste your time, and more importantly your money.

I will never patronize this establishment again. When I first arrived, there was a 30 minute wait in a nearly empty restaurant. So I decided to carry out. BAD MOVE. For a small order I waited over 45 minutes. When o finally got it, it was incorrect and missing items. I asked to speak to a manager and all he did was apologize and it wasn't even sincere, than he dropped my food in the bag and rushed off like it was nothing. The service here is the worse I've ever encountered and the food is mediocre. Never Again.
Arrived at 5:10. Bar isn't and hasn't been packed. 3 bartenders. No one ever came to take my order. Unbelievable this is ridiculous. It's now 5:40 and I'm out. Please do better.

Horrible !!! Service is horrible Arrived at 615, waitress arrived to the table at 620 and we placed a drink order and appetizers at 7pm we still did not have our drinks! The bartender hasn't made them. At 640 we ordered dinner and at 730 we were still waiting for food. The food was not good at all!!! Manager brushed us off as if we were inconveniencing him. The waitress was a dolll. The atmosphere says we are worried about who sits at the bar and no one else. NEVER AGAIN WILL I DINE HERE!

I will never come here again. Sarah the bartender started my night off with her rude attitude and smart remarks. Then when I wanted to order again she told me I had to wait twenty minutes! I came in here at 6:30pm and currently it is after 9pm and I have still not received my entree which is just a Caesar salad! The waitress was nice but I he kitchens clearly is way too slow and the service for the most part is horrible. Plus there was hair in my cousins food and expired blue cheese served with my friends wings. Don't come here please! Save your time, money, and insides!

The wait time was terrible. We ordered our food at 6:30 and for our food at 7:30 and once received my sisters food was cold, we told our server and he said she would get a fresh one well that took another 25 minutes.

This place gets a solid 3 stars. I came around Coppin's homecoming to get some food before the Migos concert. The service at the bar was only OK. The bartender was friendly, but stretched thin so he was forgetful. I understand, I'm in a food service industry, so my issue isn't with him, but with the lack of staff and organization. There were MULTIPLE bartenders that night, but it still took us forever to get basic things - drinks and apps. We had to repeat our order 3 times. Then, when we asked for more marinara sauce for the mozz sticks, that literally took 10 minutes to come out. to make it up, our last round of drinks was on the house, which was very nice of him bc everything else was just "eh". So service gets two stars knocked off.  However, the food was typical of a Fridays - decent chain bar food. The drinks (a cosmo and a blue moon) were cool too. My cosmo was well made both times. And when we were ready to leave, the bartender was prompt with our bill.  I usually only come to this location when I have something to do at Coppin. I always go in knowing that service is spotty. This place has never wowed me with great service, but at least it continues to provide a constant level of "ehh" so I know what to expect.

HORRIBLE SERVICE. Got here took 20-30 mins to get seated . THEN another 12 minutes to get seen . THEN she forgot to put our order in so she comes back to review the order again ( by then our neighbors left because they took over 30 mins) BY NOW I BEEN SITTING HERE FOR OVER40 MINS. Forgot to mention the employee argument that broke out at my table due to a runner serving us the wrong food. This place is a JOKE very unprofessional. Please somebody come and take this Friday's under a wing of New management. If I could I would give this place .5 of a star I would, do better Fridays do better.

Long story short: just grab something in the mall.  Long story: It was a slow Tuesday and I arrived at 3 just for the kids eat free special from 3-8. I called twice just to make sure and they said they were still running it. Cool. We get there at 3 and the waitress did not put our order in until 3:26. I know u may think "that's not bad" but imagine already knowing what you are going to eat and literally just sitting there for twenty minutes with a one year old who is constantly trying to get out the high chair. Appetizer came at 3:50. I only ordered boneless buffalo wings and asked for blue cheese. They gave me ranch. So I asked for blue cheese and the waitress took like 5 min. Again, you may think it's not that bad, but she came to the table twice and did not bring the blue cheese. At this point I'm thinking to myself "did I ask her to bring me blue cheese".  Finally the blue cheese arrives and I can eat it with my cold boneless buffalo wings. So around 4 our food comes out. I'm smashing on a salad because I'm trying to eat healthy when I realize my company is not eating their food. They asked for the burger to be well done and it was pink inside. The waitress comes back and we tell them the burger is not well done and my sons food is not out. I'm so used to sharing my food with my son that I forgot I ordered him his own meal which got me thinking to myself "did I place his order" anyway the wait for that was long again because my company decided to just cancel the burger and collect the check.  The burger and kids meal was on the bill. The waitress said she was going to bring over the manager to take off the burger we sent back. While the manager was there we asked about the kids special and she said "we not running that anymore". I tell her we called twice and she says sorry but that actually ended yesterday. HOW DID IT END YESTERDAY IF YESTERDAY WAS MONDAY?! I mean she wasn't even looking us in the face so that's why I got upset, just disrespectful. She didn't even try to offer a discount or anything. She said I think Mike answered the phone I'll speak to Mike. Okay is Mike gonna pay our meal though, hell, let me speak to Mike! Like the banner was still up. So we are walking out at 4:40 and 3 employees are smoking outside. Like as soon as you open the door and one says they ain't give u a bag. We said no and kept it moving because there was no way in hell I was going back in there.  People always said the service wasn't all that but I like to support my community, but nah. Oh and someone walked in to quit as soon as we sat down so I think that was a sign.  UPDATE: they sent me an $8 coupon...

Wait time to get acknowledged was at least 6 min (at a bar with 8 ppl including us)  Bartender was not pleasant and also very slow taking both drink orders and food orders.  On a good note...the manager came, then director of operations came to speak with us. Because I spoke to him, and he was so encouraging about the improvements coming to the staff at this Monday Mondawmin location, will give them an extra star and revisit in a few months.

One of the least favorite experiences, ever. Service was slower than a snail, and the food came out cold. Probably because it was sitting on the line for quite some time.. probably because my server had NO idea what table we were sitting at so the food runner was lost while delivering the items. Came in at 4:45 pm. Not busy at all, but it's 7:21 and we FINALLY got our check and can now leave.
Service at mondawmin mall is horrible,  very unprofessional and unorganized,  they Can't handle a large crowd  they need better management, they suck

The First Time I came here it was cool.I had a good time and i thats the reason why im giving it 2 stars.The area is a little better then what is was before but still Baltimore city is Baltimore city and I would it avoid it at all coast. I gave this fridays more then one chance and it failed We did not get waited on for about 15 minutes. The food was not worth the wait neither.the drinks are decent thats about it.

Bartenders are awesome! Food was fair. The manager was not very pleasant even though he messed up my takeout order twice. He was also the person that took my order. He also gave me a 20 wait time, my order took 50 minutes. If you're looking for incredible customer service, then do not come here expecting to get it.
This is by far the worst Fridays I've ever been to... Management wise....I should apply... I have 14 years under my belt... They suck!!!

The wait is ridiculous!!!! You walk in and half of the restaurant is empty yet your wait time is 30 minutes!!!!! I've come to this location on 2 occasions for the same let down.... don't waste your time folks!!  Oh and by the way the service is also slow.

Absolutely horrible from start to finish. In town for a funeral. We walked in was just pushed towards a table with my wife and daughter. Then, we were finally sat down at a table so we could place or order. We saw 3 different people during the course of ordering and then getting it to the table. Once the food hit the table I didn't see another wait staff in any respect again. No silverware, no napkins with a 5 yr old child, and absolutely shit service. I'll never be back to this one or any other TGIF again ever, period.

Came in because my friends and I were starving. Point blank period the service was a mess from the time we talk through the door all the way up until we left. Margaret was the hostess for the day and she was completely rude and nasty. She needs to find another field to work in because this industry is NOT for her. I'm from philly and I have come in contact with some rude managers and I've dealt with rude customer service before but this has been THEEEEEE WORSE experience at TGIF. We waited an hour for our food and then our waitress Amber act like she was so in a rush to do nothing when it wasn't even busy.

Poor poor poor service! Stank attitude servers. And not to mention STINGY with EVERYTHING ESPECIALLY the so called endless apps!!!! My party of friends each ordered the endless apps...& drinks. The server continued to converse with other employees to the point that we had to ask to speak to a supervisor which made no difference at all. He just smiled & nodded. Each one of the ladies at my table had two servings of the endless apps!!! And we ALL paid for & request different items. Our beverages that we ordered weren't refilled with out having to actually say excuse me please but may we have a round of refills? I was totally embarrassed bc the Fridays located @ OwingsMills was excellent. So I suggested that we go to TGI FRIDAYS . The apps there were plentiful & great service. )  BUT NOT AT MONDAWMIN MALL location! It's a shame too. The ladies  & I love to do a lil shopping & then sit down, relax, have good food , conversation & a round of drinks. We love Fridays' so please HAVE A TRAINING CLASS or something for Employees!!!
Great servers! The fried shrimp and Jack Daniel wings are amazing! (They're my favorite) The bartender did a great job fixing my drink!

Don't go here expecting good service. It seems that nobody works together. The workers seem frustrated with one another at times. It is usually a long wait to get your food. I been here  about 3 times. The food is decent. I had to wait 45 minutes for my drink the last time I went, and once I got it my glass was dirty, and so was the second glass. My server was not bad, frustrated and no team work.

I am so upset with this TGI Friday's. I've been to others in Massachusetts and Georgia where the quality of food was better and the employees were more accommodating. This location is by far was THE WORST. Normally, I don't go to chains because the quality of food is subpar, but my boyfriend really likes their Cajun Chicken and Shrimp pasta without the chicken and shrimp(he's vegetarian). It's $17.99 regardless of if you get the meat or not. He requested extra pasta in exchange for no meat and they WOULD NOT accommodate that. The staff wouldn't even give breadsticks free of charge!!!! $17.99 for pasta without any meat...that is ridiculous and because he is starving...he gave it a try. The pasta looked like a half portion and it was super bland and oily(see pic); he ended up throwing it away. The manager or owner needs to review this situation for sure. In addition, their menu is not very vegetarian friendly...$17.99 for pasta...just pasta!!! I would avoid this place if I were you and I would have given less than one star if I could. There is no consistency among locations and for a chain, that's bizarre.

The service was horrible.  The protons of food were very small.  The manager seemed to not be bothered that his customers we unhappy.  I really hope that management steps in and retrains this location.  Will not return to this location.

I've been to this Fridays several times but tonite was better far the worse service ever. We didn't have a real server. We didn't get water or drinks for 20 mins after being seated. We had several different servers working with our table and had to repeat our orders each time a different one came over. No one seemed to know what was going on.  After waiting another 40 mins for our meals, my sister asked to speak with the manager who was very nonchalant about the delays. When the food came, we didn't have any utensils to use. We asked 2 servers for silverware but no one bought any to table. My sister walked to the hostess to get utensils while our food waited at the table.  Ironically, the food was good. I asked one of our servers for the check and 2 to-go containers. Of course our bill was WRONG! I walked to the kitchen to ask for the to go containers because our server never came back with it.  Food is great but service definitely sucks!

This was one of the worst restaurants I've been to in a long time. I went with a friend to get some drinks and good food. The TGI Fridays in White Marsh and Towson are awesome. They both have great customer service and get food and gives you an overall good time. So naturally you think they all would have that standard. But I was wrong. After we got seated, It was at least 20 mins before we even seen a manager. Now that wouldnt have been a problem if they were busy. It was maybe 9 total tables with people at them. I had to ask the manager to send someone over. They sent me a bartender. I ordered my favorite drink in Friday's which was the peach sangria and My friend got a peach smash. My drink was super strong and They didnt have the right glass so they put it in a beer cup. They brought out my food which was cold. I can get over that because the next plates were hot. So we decided to get more drinks. The bartender was trying her best. My friend had to get up to put in her second order for her food. We saw another person I guess a waiter walk by, We give her the order for the drinks. We never got the drinks we ordered. Which was upsetting. But then I had to go ask for boxes. I asked the bartender, and two other waiters. But I got nothing. Then I waited to see if one of them would remember, but they didn't. Then I went to the guy standing at the door and he got me one. I really didnt wanna leave a tip but we did even when I shouldn't have. This place need to rethink their employees and mangement.

I have been to Friday's that have DJs and entertainment however, as a restaurant there is usually a dining away from loud music but not here. Very very poor management. Food was very late. Service was very poor. I would not recommend this place to anyone. Management got smart. Servers have no experience or professionalism. This Friday will be shut down within the next year if they don't hire new management and experienced servers.

I waited for a couple minutes  when the place was empty. The host came out, ignored me completely, and seated three women who had come in behind me.  She came back and I asked her if she had noticed me . She had, but said that she didn't know who was first because " she was in the back." Poor customer service. I know now why the place was empty at noon on a weekday. Training is obviously needed.

It's Monday 10/16/17 and it took an hour to be seated Ky party of five. It took 35mins for the waiter to reach my party. And that is only because I requested to converse with the MOD (Chevis). I should have wrote this after the service but since I'm waiting .... This is what I get for staying local, and not listening to my sister.

I have the same impression this time as I had the last time that I was here. My waiter was very nice but service was slow, even though it was not crowded. My guests and I overheard the bartender being very rude to some of the customers and we're not sure why, but it was very unprofessional the way that the situation was handled. Overall, this location is more so for convenience than the fact that it's a nice place to go.

I've came to this restaurant 4 times the 4th time I came was during the day (3p) other times have been after 8p and the service was beyond horrible. The people take there time and act like it's nothing wrong. I've asked for the manager on several occasions and he's not pleasant as well. He acts as if it's nothing he can do. This time I came it was still slow service was okay.

Unfortunately this location is the only one in the city. Each time I came here there is always a problem. My last visit I had a coupon which the server or the manager didn't recognize so he just said well you can use it here. It had "all locations" on the bottom of the ad from the email but he still didn't honor it. They made me pay for a milkshake that came to the table after I got my bill Bc I was waiting forever. My first visit I remember all the employees just standing around talking to one another and after each visit it was the same. There bathrooms are disgusting and I'm guessing because people who aren't eating there use it. The set of the location is nice. They have ya own parking lot. I really really wish everyone who works here go back to training class even the managers. I never had a problem with my food quality so that's he only reason they get 2 stars.

I have tried on several occasions to support the Fridays restaurant in my neighborhood.  However, I don't see myself ever going back.  I went there today with my two grandsons and my husband.  We arrived at 12:40 and were seated right away.  It took an employee 15 minutes to recognize us only to say the server would be right over.  That took another 20 minutes for the same employee to come and take our order.  We then waited another 35 minutes for the food to arrive.  One of my grandsons ordered mac and cheese with fries.  Mac and cheese came, no fries.  My other grandson ordered a flatiron steak with mashed potatoes and broccoli.  He liked the steak but the broccoli had an overbearing lemon taste.  He asked to exchange for a side salad.  By 1:50, we had no fries, no side salad, no refills on our drinks, and had not seen the server in a long while.  My husband flagged down the server and asked for a check.  I explained to the server that we had not received the other food items and the service/experience had been horrible.  He spoke with the manager and went away.  The server returned with the missing salad, the fries, and the check.  The manager attempted to explain what the problem was.  I told him this is always the same when we come here.  We finally left at 2:25  with half of their lunch in a bag.  I will never go back!

Okay let's start with we walk in and there are 3-4 employees at the host stand, none of them acknowledges any of us. After interrupting their conversation they all disperse with none of them helping. Few minutes later a lady comes from the back to seat us, takes us to a dirty table then tells us to go back to the front. We wait another 10 minutes (while 2 more parties of 3[same as mine] are seated). I have to literally go find the lady and brings us back to the table. We order vegan burger(which was burnt, sent back, and still burnt the second time) Friday's combo that had cold Buffalo wings. Grilled salmon that was burnt and jasmine rice (that was brown with tomatoes in it?) sent that back and didn't want anything else. And a Caesar salad that came out as a garden salad with Caesar dressing sent that back and got a real Caesar salad. Everything that calendar out of the kitchen was incorrect. Talked to a supervisor who said he would take the salmon off the check (he didn't) then talked to the AGM who told us taking an item off the check doesn't solve a problem in his opinion but while we were talking to him we got our incorrect check we asked him to fix and what did he do? Took the improper things off and sent it back w the server. Never saw him again.  This is by far the worst Friday's ever and I've tried it more than once still ending in a bad experience but this was by far the worst. Don't waste your time or money. It's sad how they do anything to get anyone's money this city deserves better than this bottom of the barrel Friday's. You can't just give ppl any kind of thing and think it's acceptable. Do better.  The only thing good about this place was the amazing service from Ella and Moody.
